tool_description: This is an API which extracts news/article body from a URL and uses GPT to summarize (and optionally translate) the article content. Useful for text mining purposes. Leverages powerful and flexible web scraping engine (ScrapeNinja.net) with high-quality rotating proxies under the hood. In depth review and API implementation details: https://pixeljets.com/blog/gpt-summary-is-broken/ . My video where ChatGPT summary capabilities are explored: https://youtu.be/hRQqJtgYz_Q
title: Article Extractor and Summarizer

api_list.name: /summarize
api_list.description: Summarizes the article after extracting it from the specified url.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Target language to translate summary into

parameters.name: html
parameters.description: pass TRUE if you want to convert new line symbols in API response text with html paragraph tags

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length in paragraphs. This parameter might be ignored for a very long articles.

api_list.description: Extract an article body and markdown version of the body.

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide a concise summary of the latest article on climate change from the New York Times?
Please extract and summarize the main points from the BBC News story about the recent elections.
I need a brief overview of the article discussing advancements in AI technology published on TechCrunch.
Summarize the key takeaways from the Forbes article about stock market trends this week.
Could you give me a markdown summary of the CNN report on global health initiatives?
Please extract the main ideas from the Guardian's piece on renewable energy and summarize them.
I want a short summary of the Washington Post article about the latest space exploration missions.
Summarize the essential points from the Reuters article covering the recent economic summit.
Can you provide a markdown summary of the article on cybersecurity threats published by Wired?
Please extract and summarize the main content of the National Geographic article about wildlife conservation.

api_list.name: /summarize-text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com/summarize-text"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-extractor-and-summarizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
